Segment.name: REA
Segment.comment: To provide a description of real estate or general property information

Field.name: CompositeTypeOfRealEstateAssetCode
Field.comment: To identify one or more real estate asset attributes

Field.name: Date1
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: PropertyOwnershipRightsCode
Field.comment: Code identifying legal basis for property ownership or residence status

Field.name: Date2
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: StatusOfPlansForRealEstateAssetCode
Field.comment: Code identifying plans for real estate

Field.name: DateTimePeriodFormatQualifier
Field.comment: Code indicating the date format, time format, or date and time format

Field.name: DateTimePeriod
Field.comment: Expression of a date, a time, or range of dates, times or dates and times

Field.name: CompositeUnitOfMeasure
Field.comment: To identify a composite unit of measure (See Figures Appendix for examples of use)

Field.name: ReferenceIdentification
Field.comment: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier

SyntaxNote.name: P0708
SyntaxNote.comment: If either REA07 or REA08 is present, then the other is required.

SyntaxNote.name: P0910
SyntaxNote.comment: If either REA09 or REA10 is present, then the other is required.
